text: Broek () is a small village in De Fryske Marren in the province of Friesland, the Netherlands. It had a population of around 190 in 2017.Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2017 - CBS ==History== Before 2009, Broek was part of the Skarsterlân municipality and before 1984 it was part of Doniawerstal. ==References== ==External links== Category:De Fryske Marren Category:Populated places in Friesland
title: Broek, Friesland
